Subjects: almsgiving; proverbs; aphorisms; wealth, wise use of
_description: On wealth rendering ability to do good — one couplet and concluding line

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
Whoso kanne good hath goodHe that hath no good kanne noo
                    goodeBeggars be not worshipfull
NottsULMeLm1.Note: Added by a hand of fifteenth century.
